author: Starstreak
title: It's a pad.  What more can I say?
review: I like the idea of this pad.  The elastic lego band is cool when it holds the pad closed.  Not sure if I like the spiral that holds it.  As it makes it hard to stack on my other books.  At least it has alot of pages.  Not much more to say about a pad.  Oh, I wish the pages had "easy tear" feature.
